Change the value of a radio group buttons input on the client

Change the value of a radio group buttons input on the client

updateRadioGroupButtons(session, inputId, selected = NULL)

Arguments

session

The session object passed to function given to shinyServer.
inputId

The id of the input object.
selected

The value selected.
